ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby in Lower Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh heh.  A couple weeks ago I was playing with my enchanter. We got a tough 4-mob pull, and I (being crowd controller and lowest level in the group) blew
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 15 Dec 1999, Kenneth E. Bachman wrote:
>
> As an addendum, we know that Lullaby only works if all of
> the MOBs remain unattacked other than the one we are
> focusing on (all of your group members are /assisting the
> puller, right?) This means that if ANYone else in the
> party is: a) hitting the wrong MOB, b) casting AE spells,
> or c) has a weapon with an AE proc, Lullaby will appear to
> not work. To use this song effectively, you have to make

Heh heh. A couple weeks ago I was playing with my enchanter.
We got a tough 4-mob pull, and I (being crowd controller and
lowest level in the group) blew about half my mana getting the
extras mesmerized, but I did it. I had about 3 seconds to
admire my handiwork when the wizard decided it would be a good
time for an AE spell.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
